name: VomBros
description:
Kill your bros with vomit - VomBros, is a local multiplayer platform game that allows you to kill your opponents with vom. Yes Gross! The winner transforms into a large grotesque worm, which allows you to carve a map in the next level, which, maybe will help you in your favour! (maybe)

HOW TO PLAY:

(MULTPLAYER REQUIRED) - keyboard and/or controllers
Press any button to enter the game, then press the start button to begin. 

Use the right toggle to aim and use the right trigger to shoot! 

When the worm,  use the left toggle to move left, right, up and down to customize your map. 

Credits:
Benjamin Crooks: Design, Programming, Art: character/worm
Morgan Kunhardt: Music (written by Morgan) & Sounds, Environment Art
